reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits like a glove and appreciate its fabulous quality, with one noting it doesn't look or feel cheap. The material is thick and stretchy, and customers like that it's not see-through, with one mentioning it shows off the legs nicely. They find it comfortable and flattering, with one noting it looks great on both small and large hips.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars GET IT!!!!!!!!
items.body: Soooo pretty! Fits my shape perfectly! I ordered from a different site first bc it was cheaper and got a piece of CRAP. You definitely get what you pay for bc this one was top tier!! I ordered white for my bridal shower but Iâ€™m definitely ordering other colors soon!!!!!!! Read more
items.author: Showard89

Great material, holds perfume well, and zipped with ease. Mini skirt but shows no cheeks. I did not wear shorts. Donâ€™t hesitate to add this little number to your sexy black dress collection! I wore it with no bra and you couldnâ€™t tell. Major cleavage though! It will look great on small or large hips due to the bell shaped bottom half. I love long sleeves that fall just over the hand so itâ€™s perfect, but if you donâ€™tâ€¦ you wonâ€™t like it. Read more
items.author: AB

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars YES!!
items.body: LOVE this dress. Love the fit, great quality and constructed well, thick material, hidden back zipper and yes itâ€™s lined! The sleeves are stretchy; however, the rest of the dress has very little stretch due to the lining. Overall great dress, would definitely recommend it. (Large: 5â€™5â€, 170-175, 34C/29/38) Read more
items.author: T

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Might work for you.
items.body: I bought this dress because the style was just too pretty to pass up, and it really is adorable! The fit is flattering, the fabric feels nice against the skin, not see through and the design looks just like the pictures. Unfortunately, the zipper broke while I was wearing it, which was disappointing. It might have just been a defective zipper on mine, because everything else about the dress is great Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish, Sexy/Cute
items.body: This dress is comfortable. It is short, but not distasteful. This was my birthday dress and it served looks all night. Material is perfect - not thin, not itchy. Great value for the money. Read more
items.author: Kelley

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress!
items.body: I absolutely love this dress! The material quality is thick and very comfortable. It hugs you in all the right places, very flattering. Itâ€™s the perfect low v cut, not too much or too little. I will say if youâ€™re blessed with a curvy body and bigger booty IT IS MUCH SHORTER ON THE BACK SIDE. It runs true to size. I recommend this dress! Read more
items.author: Kika

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, White, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
